applications.name: Trendupp
applications.description: Trendupp is a platform that enables influencers & content creators receive support and build direct relationships with their fans while publishing exclusive content. Trendupp is the easiest way for your audience to say thanks on both iOS and Android using Flutter and Dart

applications.name: TriviaBlog Africa
applications.description: Trivia Blog App aims to improve the quest for knowledge by rewarding users for answering random questions on the app. Questions are available at random times during the day. Winners are then picked based on the first right answer and other criteria on both iOS and Android using Flutter and Dart

applications.name: Glade
applications.description: Glade is a Fintech company with a vision to make payment of bills, airtime, transfer, funding, paymemnt splitting, virtual cards transactions seamless. I Led a mobile team for the development of the company's v2 app on both iOS and Android using Flutter and Dart

applications.name: OneWay
applications.description: A ride hailing application that connects riders and drivers moving in the same direction, drivers register with the company and get checked, stops are allocated to each driver according to stops on the platform, drivers can drop at any point between stops after paying and checked in by drivers, drivers are tracked in real time and seen by riders. Just like Uber. Has over 1k downloads on the stores.

applications.name: Ideasmarketplace
applications.description: Ideasmarketplace is a platform you can put your ideas, patents, utility models, design, business plans, copyrights and trademarks up for sale or out-licensing. You can also use Ideasmarketplace to search for ideas and innovations to purchase. I worked in a team to pull this off within 2 months, converted the UI to screens and integrated APIs to it.

applications.name: Skidster: Freight Matching App
applications.description: Skidster helps in connecting seamlessly with truckers, shippers and transporters in Canada and the United States.

applications.name: FABAT
applications.description: FABAT Provides a virtual marketplace to connect mechanics and customers.

applications.name: AutoServe
applications.description: Autoserve helps connect both vehicle owners and auto service providers. You can register as either a car owner or a service station.

applications.name: Process Serving & Court Filing
applications.description: Process Serving & Court Filing works in the US and Canada to get servers(people) that can help deliver court filing and servings to other people. They get nearby servers  using geolocation and send notifications to servers in a chosen radius. The server condoms if payment has been made through stripe and go on with the serving

applications.name: CubicLease: Lease houses
technologies: Open banking(Tink SDK and TrueLayer SDK)
applications.description: Checkboard is a service which allows people to save time when applying for your next home to buy or rent. We make things easy by taking a simple approach through our App to capture details about you. We confirm your identity through advanced AI techniques, capture your employment situation and connect you directly through open banking, to your financial accounts to verify your income, regular expenditures to complete your application.

applications.name: IntaChurch
applications.description: A Church management app used to manage events, watch Youtube videos, schedule events, view family connections.

applications.name: MoneyStory
applications.description: The Money Story App is a financial wellbeing coaching tool that helps you achieve a positive sense of wellbeing as you live out your financial life. Our digital coaching experiences harness the power of reflection to help develop positive money behaviours and improve your relationship with money.

artifacts.name: Saturday Flutter Experiments
artifacts.description: I joined in a series of experimental user interfaces challenges built entirely in Flutter done weekly.
